description: This restaurant stands on the main square of a delightful village. It serves excellent cuisine that focuses on Piedmontese traditions, while at the same time being creative and reasonably priced. Don’t miss the superb brasato al barbaresco (braised meat in a wine sauce).
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
